com.milk.command.gui
Class CommandPanel

java.lang.Object

        |
        +--java.awt.Container
              |
              +--javax.swing.JComponent

                    +--javax.swing.JScrollPane
                          |
                          +--com.milk.objed.gui.EditorPanel
                                |
                                +--com.milk.command.gui.CommandPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, EditorComponent, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.ScrollPaneConstants, java.io.Serializable
public class CommandPanel
extends EditorPanel

This is a panel which has an editor for a command argument, along with "ok" and "cancel" buttons. The "ok" button performs the command, and the "cancel" button dismisses the panel. BUG--we need a generic ErrorSink-type class so that exceptions aren't thrown in unknown (and really unknowable) contexts.

Author:
Dan Bornstein, danfuzz@milk.com
, Copyright 1999 Dan Bornstein, all rights reserved.
See Also:
Serialized Form

          This is a listener to the window for noticing when it closes.
